item.title: Trump will use other tariff authorities to get to 'same place' if Supreme Court rules against him: Hassett
item.description: Kevin Hassett said the White House could deploy alternative tariff authorities if the Supreme Court rules against President Donald Trump.

item.title: Hopes rise for Chinese property support ahead of key March meeting
